nodes.text: Gorneesh was the king of a tribe of Duloks on Endor during the time of the Galactic Civil War. His wife was named Urgah, and he had three children, including Prince Boogutt. Gorneesh and his Duloks were the sworn enemies of the Ewoks of Bright Tree Village.
King Gorneesh appeared in the animated television series Ewoks, where he was voiced by Dan Hennessey in the first season.
